AUCT-R.BK.summary: Union Auction Public Company Limited provides auction services for assets in Thailand. It is involved in the auction of vehicles, luxury brands, assets, and electronics. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

BIG-R.BK.long_name: Big Camera Corporation Public Company Limited
BIG-R.BK.summary: Big Camera Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, distributes cameras and photography-related products in Thailand. The company offers digital cameras, lens, action cameras/360 cameras, VDOs, drones, instant cameras/instant films, camera bags, straps, flashes, gimbal stabilizers, broadcast accessories, tripods, memory cards, filters, printers, binoculars, batteries, and others. It also provides mobile phones, and photography and mobile phone related products; and related services, including photographic processing and photographic equipment repair services, etc. In addition, the company is involved in the printing business. It operates approximately 200 branches. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

JMART-R.BK.summary: Jay Mart Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail of mobile phones and related accessories in Thailand. The company operates through four segments: Trading Business, Debt Collection Business, Rental Business, and Other. It also offers tablets, cameras, smart home gadgets, home appliances, smart living products, and sports and health products, as well as products for mom and kids. In addition, the company acts as the sales agent or distributor of subscriber identification module (SIM) card packages and prepaid SIM cards of mobile phone operators, including GSM, DTAC, GSM1800, and TRUE MOVE through various distribution channels. Further, it provides debt tracking, collection, and management services; car and personal loans; and finance leasing, consumer lending, insurance brokerage, and asset management services. Additionally, the company engages in the distribution of food and beverage products; and property development, e-commerce, and retail space rental businesses. Jay Mart Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

MPG-R.BK.summary: MPG Corporation Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an entertainment retailer in Thailand. The company produces and distributes technology equipment and cosmetics, as well as music and movie in the form of CDs, DVDs, and blu-rays; and acquires copyrights for music and movies. It is also involved in the renewal energy business. The company was formerly known as Mangpong 1989 Public Company Limited and changed its name to MPG Corporation Public Company Limited in October 2015. MPG Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

PTG-R.BK.summary: PTG Energy Public Company Limited trades in petroleum products, gas products, and supplies and equipment for oil service stations in Thailand. The company also trades in consumable products; and operates petrol stations. Its fuel products include diesel and gasoline. The company also trades in foods and beverages; operates coffee shops under the Pun Thai Coffee name; and engages in the transportation of fuel. In addition, it is involved in the production and trading of ethanol; provision of construction services; and operation of tank farms and service stations. Further, the company develops communication tools equipment. The company was formerly known as Paktai Chueplerng Company Limited. PTG Energy Public Company Limited was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

SE-ED-R.BK.summary: SE-Education Public Company Limited operates bookstores in Thailand. The company operates through three segments: Retail Business, Other Distribution Channels, and School Business. It operates SE-ED book centers, network stores, and various university bookstores in Bangkok and other provinces. The company also publishes books, and academic and educational journals, as well as monthly magazines. In addition, it operates Plearnpattana School, which provides courses for students from pre-kindergarten to Matayom 6; offers consulting services; designs, develops, and distributes software and hardware products; and distributes books of other publishers to bookstores. The company is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

TWZ-R.BK.summary: TWZ Corporation Public Company Limited primarily engages in communication equipment trading business in Thailand. It operates through Communication Equipment Trading, Real Estate Development, Generate and Selling Electricity Plasma, and Investment Property segments. The company distributes mobile phones, spare parts, SIM and pre-paid cards, and related accessories; and operates as a service center of telecommunication equipment. It also provides counter services for payment of service fee of mobile phones; develops and rents real estate projects; and generates and sells electricity through renewable energy. The company was incorporated in 1993 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
